metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Deedle Ofran - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group3_Prisoner1 bbf324dd-8840-4d7d-a097-1937016ae4b8 - (34; 39; 50)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Deedle Ofran
0.text: That was 'mazing! Like one of them old hero stories. Thank you.

1.speaker: Deedle Ofran
1.text: Bala and Genshu will blow a bleedin' gasket when they hear about this. Can't wait to tell 'em.
